AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez: person who died during the smuggling operation due to heat stroke caused by harsh conditions in the South Texas desert
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero: defendant, alien smuggler guide responsible for creating substantial risk of death or serious bodily injury to the undocumented aliens during the smuggling journey through South Texas
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country where the smuggling incident occurred, imposing sentencing enhancements for alien smuggling offenses
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.South Texas Trek: location of the smuggling journey guided by Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero, characterized by harsh desert conditions in June that contributed to the death of Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez
